alert.note: Alert for McIntosh (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 15 at 10:31PM CST until February 15 at 10:45PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN HASKELL...SOUTHEASTERN MCINTOSH AND NORTHEASTERN PITTSBURG COUNTIES... At 1031 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Enterprise, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Eufaula... Quinton... Crowder... Whitefield... Kinta... Canadian... Arrowhead State Park... Enterprise... Blocker... Featherston... Lewisville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
